GET /api.description: Serves up a JSON of all the available endpoints of the api

POST /api/auth/signup.description: Posts a user following sign up, stores an encrypted version of their password and responds with the posted user excluding the password

POST /api/auth/login.description: Attempts to log a user in by email and password. Stores a refresh token in a http-only cookie. Responds with an access token and the user information upon success or and obscured error message on failure.

POST /api/auth/refresh.description: Generates a new access token using a valid refresh token stored in an HTTP-only cookie. Responds with a new access token or an error if the refresh token is invalid or expired.

GET /api/auth/me.description: Retrieves the currently authenticated user's information. Requires a valid access token.
